{}.response: The 'Get signing links' API endpoint is designed to retrieve all existing signing links along with their IDs. This functionality is crucial for users who need to manage multiple documents and track their signing process efficiently. By calling this endpoint, users can obtain a list of all signing links that have been generated for their documents. This list includes unique identifiers (IDs) for each link, making it easier to reference and manage specific documents. This feature is particularly useful for businesses and individuals who rely on electronic signatures to expedite document signing processes, ensuring that they can quickly access and share links for document signing without having to generate new links each time. The endpoint enhances the user experience by simplifying document management and tracking in eSignature workflows.
